title: Explorer Photo Tours
excerpt: A lightweight and fast platform to purchase personalized photography tours across 10 tropical and subtropical countries, built with Astro and Preact to maximize performance and SEO, featuring modern design and CRO concepts.
challenge: Create a fast, SEO-friendly, and lightweight platform for personalized photography tours across diverse locations, with a modern design that encourages user engagement and conversion.
solution: Built with Astro for static site generation and performance optimization, Preact to minimize bundle size, and Anime.js for smooth animations. Hosted on Vercel to ensure scalability and fast global delivery, the platform focuses on CRO principles and modern UI design to maximize conversions.
